channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] Beam Agent - Invoice Reconciliation (beam-invoice-rec)
item.description: Automates invoice status tracking by reading emails, checking payment status, and sending responses to suppliers & internal teams.

item.title: [added] CtrlAgent (ctrlagent-inc-ctrlagent)
item.description: AI-native platform to build, deploy & govern intelligent agents that automate enterprise processes securely.
